abstract: Pauline Cafferkey, Scottish nurse who was found to have Ebola after returning from volunteer work in Sierra Leone, is in critical condition at hospital in London.
lead_paragraph: Doctors treating Pauline Cafferkey, a Scottish nurse who was found to have Ebola after returning from volunteer work in Sierra Leone, say that her condition has deteriorated to critical.

byline.contributor: Alison Smale contributed reporting from Berlin.

snippet: Doctors treating Pauline Cafferkey, a Scottish nurse who was found to have Ebola after returning from volunteer work in Sierra Leone, say that her condition has deteriorated to critical.

headline.main: Condition of British Ebola Patient Worsens
